tool_description: Fetch Famous Fictional Characters and movie data.
name: Famous Fictional Characters
title: Famous Fictional Characters

api_list.name: Get Fictional Character and Movie Data
api_list.description: This endpoint will return data including the Fictional Character and Movie.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://famous-fictional-characters.p.rapidapi.com/search/Harrison_Ford"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "famous-fictional-characters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://famous-fictional-characters.p.rapidapi.com/search/{person}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "famous-fictional-characters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
